result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dearion Ramelle Kentle

records.addlTxt: No Contact Order signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4. Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY. Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription. Defendant to be monitored by drug testing.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Macy's. Court advised Defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Dearion Ramelle Kentle appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent appeared by video for Dearion Ramelle Kentle.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Dearion Ramelle Kentle
Current: 4200 N 68th St, Milwaukee, WI 53216 United States  (Effective: 08-25-2022)
Prior: 8214 West Bender Avenue #1, Milwaukee, WI 53218

Defendant Dearion Ramelle Kentle not in court. 
Initial appearance scheduled for this date 09-15-2022. Defendant is in custody at CJF. Needs to be produced for court.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 9/15/22 @ 2p
